prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and flowing tentacles.
Show me a prehistoric Pokemon that resembles a mollusk with vibrant blue features.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a hard exterior and is known for its aquatic abilities.
Generate a creature that combines a spiraled shell with elegant blue appendages.
Design a fossil Pokemon with a unique color scheme of white and blue accents.
Give me an ancient sea creature that evolves from a smaller form and has tentacles.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both the beauty of the ocean and the mystery of fossils.
